localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Stoa combines the ancient philosophy of Stoicism with mindfulness meditation in a practical meditation app. Join thousands by using it to practice the Stoic disciplines and becoming calmer, more resilient, and virtuous.
nodes.title: Stoa - Ancient philosophy and meditation app
nodes.author: Caleb Ontiveros

nodes.excerpt: Simplify Mindfulness is an Open mental health platform for everyone. It is for discussing anxiety, depression and OCD, and many other issues. Anyone can post their queries openly and answer them.
nodes.title: Simplify Mindfulness - Open mental health platform for everyone
nodes.author: Saurabh Jadhav

nodes.excerpt: Improve your mental health and wellness with simple daily activities in Whole! The app focuses on promoting self-care by encouraging users to check in daily and complete habits and tasks that are scientifically proven to improve your mental health.
nodes.title: Whole - Self care habit builder to improve your mental health
nodes.author: Mauro Gatti

nodes.excerpt: loÃ³na is the first app that lets you quickly disconnect from a long stressful day and get in the right mood for sleep. From the team behind https://www.producthunt.com/posts/msqrd.
nodes.title: LoÃ³na - Stories & sounds to drift off
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Meet first meditation creation and practicing app aka Mindist. Benefit right away from: - Meditation recording studio in a pocket for mindfulness teachers - Diverse meditation content to practice for users - Matching users with teachers
nodes.title: Mindist - First meditation creation & practicing app
nodes.author: Pavlo Pedenko

nodes.excerpt: Shimmer offers online video support groups for personal growth led by coaches. Members join a small group of others with shared identity & experiences, where they meet weekly via video chat, attend community events, and become the best version of themselves.
nodes.title: shimmer - Find people who get you and improve your mental well-being
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: AQâ„¢ is the first biomarker-based personalized mindfulness app. Be mentally fit with AQâ„¢ by: - Tracking your mental fitness in real-time, 24/7 - Receiving relaxing music and nature soundscapes when most needed, and - Training with guided meditations and lessons based on your current mental fitness needs.
nodes.title: AQ: Attention Quotient - Be mentally fit, biomarker-based mindfulness
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: WindowSwap: Open a new window somewhere in the world. A global community sharing the view from their windows to brighten someoneâ€™s day, somewhere in the world. WindowSwap is currently used by thousands as a way to relax, reflect, focus or for travel inspo.
nodes.title: WindowSwap 2.0 - Open a new window somewhere in the world.
nodes.author: Sonali Ranjit

nodes.excerpt: Meditation music for your videos, guided meditations, apps, and more. Commercial use allowed.
nodes.title: Meditation Music by ZENmix - Royalty free meditation music for commercial use
nodes.author: Jens Boje

nodes.excerpt: We believe that sleep quality is closely connected with your mental wellbeing. Positive thinking is a new approach to improving sleep. Self-love, Personal growth, Love & Friendship, Stress & Anxiety, Financial stability - choose any category! Get some Rest! ğŸ’œ
nodes.title: Restly - Use the power of positive thinking to transform your life
nodes.author: Aleksandr Lanin

nodes.excerpt: Breathly is a 100% free mobile app that helps you focus on your breathing. Use Breathly for daily relaxation and breath training: just choose a breathing technique and focus on the guided exercise. Breathly is free, with no trackers and no in-app purchases.
nodes.title: Breathly - Open-source breath training and relaxation app
nodes.author: Matteo Mazzarolo

nodes.excerpt: A new iOS and iPadOS with personal advice, goal tracking, meditation scenes, daily motivation and more.
nodes.title: Better Year App - Make 2021 a better year: personal advice, goals & meditation
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Meditation apps are great but they donâ€™t address real world events and situations. I curse. You curse. Why shouldnâ€™t your meditations? We recorded some oddly specific meditations for your peace of mind. Presenting MindF*** from the makers at Bad Unicorn ğŸ¦„
nodes.title: MindF*** - Itâ€™s like Headspace but with occasional profanity ğŸ™‰
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
nodes.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life
nodes.author: John Caffier

nodes.excerpt: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.
nodes.title: The Silent Podcast - A daily 10 minutes pocket of stillness in your podcast feed
nodes.author: Gabriel Krieshok

nodes.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...
nodes.title: Lumenate - Effortlessly explore your subconscious
nodes.author: Tom Galea

nodes.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
nodes.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link
nodes.author: Calvin Benton

nodes.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
nodes.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.
nodes.author: Jillian Schuller

nodes.excerpt: The Logbook makes journaling easier than ever, you don't have to log how are you feeling every day to know more about yourself, the Logbook makes it easy to track goals and moments that contributed to them, through a secure and private experience.
nodes.title: Logbook - Your personal space to reflect on experiences and emotions.
nodes.author: Luis  Castro

nodes.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
nodes.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.
nodes.author: Cristiano Dalbem
